hero.title: Your New Place

about.title: Perfect Blend of Modernity and Nature
about.description: Afropolis is a carefully designed, secure enclave offering modern homes in the heart of Gambia. We've created a place where comfort meets exotic nature, and the community enjoys peace and luxurious amenities.

features.pool: Access to private club and pool

villaKora.name: Villa Kora (Type A)
villaKora.description: A modern, two-story home with 120 m² featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a private garden. Bright interiors and functional layout make it the perfect choice for your family.

villaBalafon.name: Villa Balafon (Type B)
villaBalafon.description: Spacious design (140 m²) with large windows, upstairs terrace, and open living area. Experience luxury and space while enjoying views of tropical greenery.

location.title: Find Your Paradise
location.description: Our community is located in a dynamically developing area that offers the best of Gambia. Enjoy peace while being close to vibrant centers, restaurants, and golden beaches.

distances.shops: 5 min to local shops and restaurants

hero.title: AFROPOLIS ESTATE
hero.subtitle: Kachume - Live on the Smiling Coast of Africa
hero.tagline: Just minutes from Atlantic Ocean coast

intro.title: A peaceful oasis in the heart of authentic Gambia
intro.description: The village of Kachume is a picturesque and peaceful place located in western Gambia, just minutes from the beautiful and still wild beaches of the Atlantic Ocean, dozens of minutes from vibrant seaside resorts and 30 minutes from the airport. It's a unique region where nature, tradition and modernity meet in harmony, creating ideal conditions for living, relaxation and investment.

project.title: Newly developed estate of 36 modern homes
project.description: This is a unique residential project that combines the comfort of modern lifestyle with the charm of African nature. Surrounded by greenery of palm trees, fresh air and a friendly local community create an atmosphere of peace and security that is hard to find elsewhere.
project.access: The region offers easy access to main roads, schools, local markets and beaches, while maintaining the silence and intimacy valued by those wishing to escape the urban hustle.

whyKachume.title: Why Kachume?

features.nature: Proximity to nature and unique views
features.opportunity: Excellent opportunity for investors and those seeking a second home

whyKachume.conclusion: Kachume is the future of comfortable living in Gambia – a place where you can find peace, freedom and space to realize your dreams.

whyInvest.title: Why invest in AFROPOLIS ESTATE in Kachume?

reasons.location: Strategic location: close to the ocean, airport, urban centers and main communication routes
reasons.port: New seaport under construction: in the Sanyang area, the second main and largest seaport in Gambia is being built, which in the coming years will significantly increase property values and develop local infrastructure
reasons.climate: Stable climate and security: year-round sunshine, clean air and friendly community
reasons.development: Regional development: government and private investments attract capital and tourists
reasons.profit: High profit potential: Gambia is one of the fastest-growing investment locations in West Africa

whyInvest.conclusion: AFROPOLIS ESTATE Kachume is more than a home – it's a lifestyle in a place where nature meets modernity, and every investment has real value for the future.
